code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{useParams}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TaskDetails=()=>{const{id}=useParams();const[task,setTask]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{axios.get("/api/tasks/".concat(id)).then(response=>setTask(response.data)).catch(error=>console.error('Error fetching task:',error));},[id]);if(!task)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading..."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:task.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:task.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Due: ",new Date(task.dueDate).toLocaleDateString()]})]});};export default TaskDetails;
